meanings.definition: A large estate or plantation, especially in a Spanish-speaking country.
meanings.sent1: The hacienda had vast fields for growing crops.
meanings.sent2: We visited a beautiful hacienda in Mexico last summer.
meanings.sent3: The cows on the hacienda decided to have a dance party.

meanings.sent5: The old hacienda stood proudly against the backdrop of the mountains.

meanings.sent3: The mice in the hacienda threw a tiny tea party.
